title: World Health = Converged Population
author: VD
content_html:
“The World Health Organization is about as interested in world health as the arms industry is interested in world peace.” – Christine Anderson, Member of the European Parliament

She’s not wrong. Note that like all converged Clown World institutions, the WHO subverts the very definition of health.

The WHO’s purpose is to achieve the highest possible level of health for all the world’s people, defining health as “a state of complete physical, mental and social well-being and not merely the absence of disease or infirmity.”

Sounds familiar, doesn’t it. It echoes John Stuart Mill’s concept of universal forced global convergence, and redefines human health as comprehensive “state of being” that meets with the approval of the organization’s evil masters. And every human possessing a state of being that doesn’t meet with that approval is supposed to be removed from the population.

However, it’s the organization and its masters that are now being removed. The mass vaxxing of the world may not have been its last desperate attempt, but it was likely one of the last ones it will be able to muster.

DISCUSS ON SG
